schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.blocked: To create your schedule, refer to the “Subjects you teach” section below and follow the instructions there.

noSubjects.title: No subjects
noSubjects.subtitle: Subject links incomplete
noSubjects.supportingText: Administrators have already assigned subjects to you. For them to show up here, you must link those subjects in the classes you teach. Use the “Add subject” button to learn more and link.

addSubject.title: Add subject
addSubject.supportingText: Select a subject, then assign the classes you will teach this subject to.
addSubject.subject: Subject
addSubject.detailsInfo: To add more details about your subject that’s unique to each class, use the “See details” button on each subject once you’re done.
addSubject.scheduleInfo: You can now also add this subject to your schedule.
